messages.body: Roku: The Dominant Smart TV Platform $ROKU $GOOG $GOOGL $AAPL $BBY $AMZN https://seekingalpha.com/article/4188057-roku-dominant-smart-tv-platform

links.title: Roku: The Dominant Smart TV Platform
links.description: In what has quickly become a commoditized product category, Roku ( ROKU) has established itself as a clear winner within the battle for Smart Television operating systems. As the cost of Smart TVs continue to come down, cord cutting accelerates and Roku shifts into advertising and channel distribution, I believe Roku is positioned for several years of continued growth.

messages.body: Monday’s Vital Data: $GE, $AAPL and $TSLA https://investorplace.com/2018/07/mondays-vital-data-general-electric-company-apple-and-tesla/

links.title: Monday's Vital Data: General Electric Company, Apple and Tesla
links.description: U.S. stock futures are trading flat to lower this morning. Wall Street's enthusiasm for corporate earnings is once again being hampered by geopolitical issues. Specifically, President Donald Trump fired back at Iranian President Hassan Rouhani in an all-caps tweet on Sunday. Trump's volatile tweet follows a warning from Rouhani to not pursue hostile policy toward Iran.

links.title: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL): Apple Inc. (AAPL): PT Raised News | StockNews.com
links.description: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets mobile communication and media devices, personal computers, watches, and portable digital music players worldwide, including iPhone, iPad, Mac, iPod, Apple TV, and more. The company also sells related software, services, accessories, networking solutions, and third-party digital content and applications.

links.title: Why All 5 FAANG Stocks Are Destined to Stay Hot for the Rest of 2018
links.description: Investors in the popular FAANG acronym shouldn't let a harsh market reaction to mixed earnings from component Netflix ( NFLX) shake their confidence. Piper Jaffray analyst Michael Olson continues to expect the FAANG complex to outperform for the rest of 2018.
